overview.title: Documents We Prepare
overview.content: Specialist referrals, second-opinion letters, insurance forms, visa and immigration medicals, fit-to-fly notes, school health certificates, vaccination summaries, and occupational health reports. All documents are written by a GMC-registered doctor on headed paper.

faq.question: Do I need an appointment?
faq.answer: For new patients we require a short consultation to verify medical history before issuing documentation.

faq.question: Can you courier documents overseas?
faq.answer: Yes, we partner with secure couriers for global delivery (fees apply).

faq.question: Are digital signatures accepted?
faq.answer: Most partners accept e-signed PDFs; let us know if a wet signature is required.
